name: Vegan Vince
description:
Controls:

Movement (left/right):  AD

Normal Attack: L

Special Attack: K

Upgrade selection: 1/2/3

Objective

Survive the attacks of the GMO vegetables.

Story

Vegan Vince needs to make a salad for his party guests that are coming soon.

In a world where GMO vegetables have advanced to their ultimate form, Vegan Vince is determined to slice his way to make his staple party meal.
